sections.heading: 1. Free Plan
points: The free version includes 1 Admin User, 5 Employees, and 1 Project by default.
Default login credentials will be provided for initial access.

sections.heading: 2. Communication
points: We will send important updates and notifications periodically through Email and WhatsApp.
By using this application, you agree to receive these communications.

sections.heading: 3. Account Security
points: To activate your company account, you must change the default password and log in again.
Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials.

sections.heading: 4. Reports & Branding
points: Reports will be fully enabled only after uploading the Company Logo, Header, and Footer images.
Until then, the system will display Default Company branding and logo in reports and screens.

sections.heading: 5. General Terms
points: The company reserves the right to update or modify these Terms & Conditions at any time.
Continued use of the application indicates acceptance of the updated terms.
